definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Independent, self-motivated, enthusiasm and well organized with analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 獨立，自我激勵，積極性和良好的分析能力，組織。

sentences.english: That’s how negative people could drain your positive energy.
sentences.chinese: 這就是消極的人如何打消掉你的積極性了。

sentences.english: Most managers attempt to influence employee motivation using both positive and negative approaches.
sentences.chinese: 大多數經理試圖正負雙法並舉，激發員工的積極性。

sentences.english: The papers chorused the praises of the positive suggestions of the government.
sentences.chinese: 各大報紙不約而同地頌揚政府積極性的建議。

sentences.english: This positivity will then be returned by others.
sentences.chinese: 這種積極性，將從他人那反饋回來。

sentences.english: In those days, I prided myself on my activism.
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子裏，我自豪於我的積極性。

sentences.english: Registered urban residents are none too keen either.
sentences.chinese: 登記在冊的城鎮居民對此也沒有什麼積極性。

sentences.english: The farmer is planted grain enthusiasm rises, situation of production of spring ploughing spring sowing is better.
sentences.chinese: 農民種糧積極性提高，春耕春播生產形勢較好。

sentences.english: Now what does this have to do with positivity you might ask?
sentences.chinese: 現在你可能會問到，這根積極性有什麼關係？

sentences.english: We will reinforce the sales promotion member's selling enthusiasm , will make every effort to raise a product selling amounts.
sentences.chinese: 我們將加強促銷員的售賣積極性，力求提高產品銷量。

sentences.english: Sub-grade awards, which can greatly enhance the student's enthusiasm to learn English.
sentences.chinese: 分年級評獎，這樣可以大大提高學生學英語的積極性。

sentences.english: We will enhance our sales persons' enthusiasm, making every effort to improve the sales amount.
sentences.chinese: 我們將加強促銷員的售賣積極性，力求提高產品銷量。

sentences.english: Help her learn to take charge of her own enthusiasms.
sentences.chinese: 幫她學會掌控她自己的積極性。

sentences.english: Mr Bai does not curb initiative.
Every newspaper invariably speaks highly to the suggestion put forward by the government.
sentences.chinese: 各大報紙不約而同地頌揚政府積極性的建議。

sentences.english: You have to be able to listen well if you are going to motivate the people who work for you .
sentences.chinese: 你要善於聽取意見才能調動你手下工作人員的積極性。

definition: to transfer/to maneuver (troops etc)/movement of personnel/to mobilize/to bring into play
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
